template_input_params.name: ip_address
template_input_params.description: IP Address of the HOST where Dynatrace OneAgent will be installed.
template_input_params.label: IP address

template_input_params.name: user
template_input_params.description: Userid to install the Dynatrace OneAgent. root required.
template_input_params.label: Operating system user

template_input_params.name: private_key
template_input_params.description: Private key of the installation user. This value should be base64 encoded
template_input_params.label: Operating system private key

template_input_params.name: dynatrace_env_id
template_input_params.description: Dynatrace Environment ID. This is the string that precedes live.dynatrace.com in the URL provided to you for installation when logged in to dynatrace.com
template_input_params.label: Dynatrace Environment ID

template_input_params.name: dynatrace_api_token
template_input_params.description: Dynatrace API Token. This token must have InstallerDownload scope. A token with the required scope can be found by default when logged in to dynatrace.com at Settings > Integration > Platform as a Service.
template_input_params.label: Dynatrace API Token

template_input_params.name: dynatrace_logs
template_input_params.description: Enable sending stdout/stderr logs from monitored processes to Dynatrace.
template_input_params.label: APM agent URI type
